f572499b-6443-4b20-8c92-06f2de78e97b.description: Certified professionals will be equipped with industry-relevant skillsets for investigating data attributes to establish correlation and to discover the underlying patterns using techniques such as correlation analysis, association rules & k-means clustering. Deep understanding of data mining, data warehouse & data mart. Acquired skills include creating interactive dashboards, engaging reports & using business intelligence tools. Tools used are Power BI, Tableau & RapidMiner.
f572499b-6443-4b20-8c92-06f2de78e97b.name: Certified Business Analytics Specialist (CBAS)

alignments.name: Critical Infocomm Technology Resource Programme PLUS (CITREP+)
alignments.description: The Critical Infocomm Technology Resource Programme Plus (CITREP+) is a programme under IMDA's TechSkills Accelerator (TeSA) initiative to support the ICT workforce in keeping pace with technology shifts, through the continuous and proactive training of technical skills sets, in order to remain relevant and productive.

alignments.name: SkillsFuture Singapore (SSG)
alignments.description: SkillsFuture is a national movement that provides opportunities for all Singaporeans to develop to their fullest potential at different stages of their lives. Regardless of your starting point, you can realise your goals and aspirations through a holistic system of education and training.

alignments.name: IBF FTS
alignments.description: The Financial Training Scheme ("FTS") provides funding for financial sector-specific training programmes which are recognized under FTS.

alignments.name: NTUC Training Fund (SEPs)
alignments.description: The National Trade Union Congress (NTUC) is introducing the NTUC Training Fund (SEPs) to help Self-Employed Persons to supplement their income and, also prepare them to be future-ready through skills upgrading and training.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the CBAS certification program
Pass a multiple-choice question (MCQ) exam either in the classroom or online via Moodle
Individual case study-based Project Work Component (PWC)

623cf508-3d30-4920-b967-0aba0da085eb.description: Certified professionals will have a solid understanding of how cutting edge businesses use data to optimize marketing, maximize revenue and make operations efficient. Acquired skills include statistical and analytical methodologies & techniques for data science, predictive modelling and data mining. Also knowledge of R programming, MongoDB , NoSQL and DML.
623cf508-3d30-4920-b967-0aba0da085eb.name: Certified Data Analytics (R) Specialist (CDAS)

6d16fd89-6464-4ce3-8e41-e42848411a0f.description: Certified CMLS professionals will be equipped with practical skills to implement classification & regression models using various supervised learning algorithms such as linear & logistic regression models, k-nearest neighbors, neural networks, support vector machine, decision trees & ensemble methods such as random forest. Also skills related to the implementation of unsupervised learning algorithms such as k-means clustering. Tools used are SCIPY, TensorFlow, NumPy, Pandas & Scikit-learn.
6d16fd89-6464-4ce3-8e41-e42848411a0f.name: Certified Machine Learning Specialist (CMLS)

c418d30a-dc15-41e1-848e-4c8a025f8fe9.description: Certified professionals will be equipped with a thorough understanding of the blockchain technology including platform, smart contracts & cryptocurrency which is one of the largest applications of blockchain. Smart contracts with Solidity programming enables participants to build a decentralized application. Participants will gain a solid understanding of alternative coins & the technology they encompass such as Hashgraph.Tools used are Python, Ethereum, VirtualBox & Ubuntu.
c418d30a-dc15-41e1-848e-4c8a025f8fe9.name: Certified Blockchain Specialist (CBS)

dddf2e24-ddee-479f-b42e-bcbf9cd882b3.description: Certified professionals will gain a solid understanding of the different pieces of an IoT system and how they interact. Also, they will acquire knowledge on AI for IoT, API Design considerations for the IoT and manage smart IoT projects through different platforms. This program leverages and explores the infrastructure, communication, sensor technologies, networking technologies, data analytics and security aspects of IoT. Tools used are Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Mosquitto MQTT & Ubuntu.
dddf2e24-ddee-479f-b42e-bcbf9cd882b3.name: Certified Internet of Things Specialist (CIoTS)

Tools used are Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Blynk, Mosquitto MQTT, Ubuntu & Node MCU.
036ce664-4bf6-4606-b0f8-fd8a5ed22d81.name: Certified Internet of Things Professional (CIoTP)

3d0941d4-2351-484c-b82f-f04408d37263.description: Certified professionals will be equipped with various technical, management and governance skills needed to successfully identify, deploy and manage applications in the Cloud, and to implement enterprise cloud strategy. They will acquire the requisite skills to satisfactorily address the issue and challenges of Cloud technology, develop cloud-based applications, offer cloud computing services, and deploy applications in the Cloud. Tools used are Ubuntu, Oracle Virtual Box, Docker and Jenkins.
3d0941d4-2351-484c-b82f-f04408d37263.name: Certified Cloud Computing Professional (CCCP)

f4aaebd1-350e-4b1d-b53c-1089157d42da.description: Certified professionals will acquire a good understanding of the concepts of big data, data/information architecture, data warehousing, business intelligence, NoSQL approach, NoSQL & analytical tools. In addition, the training focuses on MongoDB to implement different ways to store and handle data that can be modeled as a document format. Tools used are MongoDB, MongoDB Compass, MongoDB Atlas & RapidMiner.
f4aaebd1-350e-4b1d-b53c-1089157d42da.name: Certified NoSQL (MongoDB) Analyst (CNA)

ca7843b3-fda0-4340-bdc7-e1c464e30be3.description: Certified professionals will be equipped with technical skills on how to transform big data into business insights and solutions. This program covers the concept of big data technologies supported with hands-on using Apache Hadoop, Apache Hive, Apache HBase & RapidMiner. It also covers the different types of business analytics with real life use cases including association rule mining and regression models. Tools used are Hadoop, HDFS, HBase, Hive, Oracle Virtual Machine & RapidMiner.
ca7843b3-fda0-4340-bdc7-e1c464e30be3.name: Certified Big Data Science Analyst (CBDSA)

8e3861a9-8e31-450e-83ca-2be82d17a32e.description: This training will address the basics of machine learning and cybersecurity, best practices to cybersecurity, malware analysis, cybersecurity attack using machine learning, password brute force attack, and anomaly detection through demo/hands-on sessions.
8e3861a9-8e31-450e-83ca-2be82d17a32e.name: Certified AI Cyber Security Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the certification program
Pass a multiple-choice question (MCQ) exam either in the classroom or online via Moodle
Individual case study-based Project Work Component (PWC)

be39e798-b126-45da-8f23-fd5c523f2de4.description: Participants will gain a solid understanding and practical skillset of building intelligent computing models using Python Jupyter Notebook platform using packages like Scikit-learn and TensorFlow. This program leverages intuitive approach to build complex models with humans-like intelligence that solves real-world problems using Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques. Tools used are Jupyter Notebook, TensorFlow & Scikit-learn.
be39e798-b126-45da-8f23-fd5c523f2de4.name: Certified Deep Learning Specialist (CDLS)
